text: wayaqul aladhin amanuu biallah wrswlh: hla nuzzilt surat min allah tamuruna bjhad alkfar, fa'iidha 'unzilt surat muhkamat balbyan walfrayd wdhukr fiha aljhad, ra'ayt aladhin fi qulubihim shakin fi din allah wnfaq yanzurun 'iilayk -ayha alnby- nazar aldhy qad ghushi ealayh khwf almwt, fawla lhwla' aladhin fi qulubihim marad 'an ytyeu allh, wa'ana yaquluu qawlana mwafqana llshre. fa'iidha wjb alqital waja' 'amr allah bifardh karih hwla' almunafiqun dhlk, falaw sadaquu allah fi al'iiman waleamal lakan khyrana lahum min almesyt walmkhalft
